wikipedia_page.main: Christopher (Chris) John Lennie (born 22 February 1953) is a British politician and life peer who served as Deputy General Secretary of the Labour Party from 2001 to 2012. He has been an Oppositon Whip in the House of Lords since 2016 and a Shadow Spokesperson since 2021.
